long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simple chrome extension for searching any text on all open tabs / windows. 


Keyboard shortcuts:

Command + Shift + K: Open tabSearch->r
Escape: Close tabSearch->r
Enter: Search / Select
Backspace: Go back to search from results
ArrowUp / ArrowDown: Navigate on search results
